relation: Disable input, avoid double send clicks
error reporting, looks like mails are currently silently discarded in case of a composing error!
Eg. by expanding the editor to show the entire content and using a toplevel QML Flickable element
pageTitle: Difference between revisions of "Projects/PIM/Mobile" - KDE TechBase
textBeforeTable: Composer KMail Mobile [mailto: <>] Initial Akonadi startup takes a bit, so show some progress for example. Also consider an error overlay like on the desktop. Startup Screen TO DO Artur <artur.souza@openbossa.org> Indicate that a folder/mail/etc. is currently being loaded - (logic by steveire - waiting graphics) Progress reporting IN PROGRESS [mailto: <>] There are ugly patches in komo/kdelibs which deal with some of them already Native file dialogs TO DO [mailto: <>] Find a way to organize more than 6 actions in there, Nuno, Björn and Steve have various ideas for that already Action slideout panel for more actions TO DO Artur <artur.souza@openbossa.org> Key presses end up in text input fields without focus (Qt bug - being worked on) Text Input Focus
